name: Neo Aetheres
description:
This project is still early in development, but if you want to play it now you're more than welcome!

Neo Aetheres is a voxel world where you start with nothing but a computer terminal. The terminal you possess is linked directly to source. This is where you came from. If you lose signal with source, your systems slowly corrupt until you're destroyed. The farther you go out into the world the more challenges there are, but there is also greater reward. Therefore an objective is the build outwards and expand source's signal throughout the world. Your terminal and Source OS will play a big part in your expansion.

This is a purely multiplayer project. You can host a server for you and your friends through the client. If you want to play singleplayer you can set your world to closed, and change the port to one that's closed on your network.

System Requirements:

OS: Windows 10
DirectX: Version 12
Processor: Tested on Intel i7 3820
Graphics: Tested on NVIDIA GTX 1060
Memory: 8GB RAM
Storage: 512 MB available space
Input: Keyboard and Mouse w/ partial XInput support
Note: You can likely use a slightly lesser CPU/GPU and still run the game fine

There are currently limited features in the world, but updates will come out often, so feel free to keep tabs on this page until auto updating is in place. Notices on when updates are released will also be posted on Twitter.

Do note that this project is in active development and there could be bugs, so save often.

Feedback is always welcome, and if you run into any issues feel free to let me know and they'll be taken care of as soon as possible.
